body: Mark my words. If this might get a translation, it will not only land on the "Popular Now" but it will also have a comment section filled to the brim with vanilla-lovers. Who will only discover in the second volume how dark the story really is and cry about it.
Someone please translate this DJ, i didn't understand a word but i believe this is wholsome
I didn't understand a word but I feel in my soul that this shines brighter than any gem basked by sunlight ever could
